mapper.select: select a.ass_id,ass_name,ass_brief,ass_total, ass_status,ass_create_time, user_ass_role,user_ass_status from association a,user_association b,user where b.user_id = user.user_id and a.ass_id = b.ass_id and user.user_id = #{userId} and ass_name like "%"#{query}"%"

select b.activity_id,b.activity_name,b.activity_brief,b.activity_type, activity_leave,activity_status,activity_people,activity_credit, activity_score, activity_create_time,activity_sign_begin_time,activity_sign_end_time,activity_begin_time activity_end_time,b.ass_id,c.ass_name,user_activity_status from user_activity a,activity b,association c where a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.activity_id = b.activity_id AND b.ass_id = c.ass_id AND b.activity_name like "%"#{query}"%"
